document.full_text: fiat spa will pay $1.27 billion euros for an additional 16 percent stake in automaker chrysler this quarter, raising its stake to 46 percent in a deal that was faster and cheaper than expected.
document.title: fiat to pay $1.3 billion to up chrysler stake to 46 percent
lines_and_colors: fiat spa will pay $1.27 billion euros for an additional 16 percent stake in automaker chrysler this quarter, raising its stake to 46 percent in a deal that was faster and cheaper than expected.
